name: Ninja Frog (StingerDev)
description:
This my first game jam. I tried to make a shooter game in 72 hours, but I had only 9 hours to work on the game. Hope you enjoy it!

WASD/ arrow keys-move

mouse-aim

escape-menu

arrow keys-move in menu

enter-apply your edits in the menu

All graphics are done by me (except the font)

Music is from  https://www.zapsplat.com

sound effects are from https://freesound.org/
